Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2008 12:01AM shelteringtree wrote: Thanks for all the info. and the link. My breast actually looks very normal in bras. Since I had small breasts from the get go I always wore padded bras and that is basicly what is "seen" through clothes. I have worn an underwire since without problem. Prior to bc I had planned on getting a breast enlargement. I was a nice full B cup when I was pregnant and that is what I want to be all the time. Would I need to see a specialist PS for that or is that something any PS can do? Boobytrapped (love the name!)- I haven't experienced any numbness at lumpectomy site or at SNB site. I'm sorry that is happening for you. Is it possible it may correct with time? Christina
